entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Peterborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:11 p.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.2Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 1:09 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.2°C

Visibility: 6 km
Humidity: 98 %

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to periods of rain this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain near noon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:25 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Temperature rising to 11 by morning. Forecast issued 11:25 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 12 with temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon. High 12 with temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:25 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
